system.description: This spell functions like fireball, except that the burst deals 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 20d6) and can detonate up to 5 rounds after casting. You choose the delay when completing the spell. The glowing bead can detonate immediately or sit at its destination until it detonates. A creature can pick up and hurl the bead as a thrown weapon (range increment 10 ft.). If the bead is handled and moved within 1 round of detonation, there is a 25% chance it detonates while being handled.

components.materialDescription: A ball of bat guano and sulfur.
